name: zlodzieje
description:
You are leader of group of thieves, and as a leader you have the most important task, of planning out every step and action of  your group. Choose who will join you in your next heist, plan out eveything and then watch their execution of your tasks. But be aware, every single one of your thieves has to vanish from crime scene after 60 seconds.

Controls:

  • WASD to control cursor or thief after selecting
  • E to wait for 1 second
  • Z to cancel last move
  • Hold H to start the heist, or go back to planning
  • You can anytime hold R to restart mission, but you will lose any spent gold
  • M to mute

Creating group is pretty unresponsive, so if you press H and can't proceed, you probably don't have gold, or didn't pick any character.

And remember to pick up loot after unlocking objects.

Made in around 39 hours for 85th Mini Jam with theme Gold and limitation 60 seconds.

Used font: Joystix monospace.
